description.english: Escape from Tilo’s cell.
description.french: Évadez-vous de la cellule de Tilo.
description.german: Entkomme aus Tilos Zelle.
description.italian: Fuggi dalla cella di Tilo.
description.russian: Совершите побег из камеры Тило.
description.schinese: 逃离蒂洛的牢房。
description.spanish: Escapa de la celda de Tilo.

description.english: Discover Duinlan’s tomb.
description.french: Découvrez la tombe de Deluinn.
description.german: Entdecke Diluins Grab.
description.italian: Scopri la tomba di Delowin.
description.russian: Найдите гробницу Дуинлан.
description.schinese: 发现碓兰的坟墓。
description.spanish: Descubre la tumba de Derreina.

description.english: Rid Dwindling Heights of all spiders.
description.french: Débarrassez Fort Deruine de toutes les araignées.
description.german: Befreie Burg Dieruin von allen Spinnen.
description.italian: Elimina tutti i ragni da Forte Derovin.
description.russian: Избавьте Тающие башни от всех пауков.
description.schinese: 除去所有颓然高地的蜘蛛。
description.spanish: Deshazte de las arañas de Altos Derruina.

description.english: Reach the desolate shore.
description.french: Rendez-vous à la Plage de l'ossuaire.
description.german: Erreiche den Knochenstrand.
description.italian: Raggiungi la Riva d’ossa.
description.russian: Доберитесь до Костяного берега.
description.schinese: 到达骨岸。
description.spanish: Alcanza la Costa Ósea.

description.english: Reach the end of the game.
description.french: Terminez le jeu.
description.german: Der Hauch einer Geschichte
description.italian: Raggiungi la fine del gioco.
description.russian: Дойдите до конца игры.
description.schinese: 到达比赛的终点。
description.spanish: Llega al final del juego.

description.english: Complete all of Gusto and Fatale's quests.
description.french: Terminez toutes les quêtes de Gusto et Fatale.
description.german: Schließe alle Missionen von Gusto und Fatale ab.
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni di Gusto e Fatale.
description.russian: Выполните все задания Гасто и Фаталь.
description.schinese: 完成所有古斯托和范塔尔的任务。
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones de Gusto y Fatale.

description.english: Finish every secondary quest.
description.french: Terminez toutes les quêtes secondaires.
description.german: Beende alle Nebenmissionen.
description.italian: Completa ogni missione secondaria.
description.russian: Выполните все второстепенные задания.
description.schinese: 完成所有次要任务。
description.spanish: Termina todas las misiones secundarias.

description.english: Complete the full set of Duinlan's armour.
description.french: Rassemblez toutes les pièces de l'armure de Deluinn.
description.german: Sammle die komplette Montur von Diluin.
description.italian: Completa tutta l’armatura di Delowin.
description.russian: Соберите полный комплект доспехов Дуинлан.
description.schinese: 完成收集碓兰的全套盔甲。
description.spanish: Completa la armadura de Derreina.

displayName.french: Le roi de la chasse aux champignons

description.english: Gather fifty-five mushrooms.
description.french: Ramassez cinquante-cinq champignons.
description.german: Sammle fünfundfünfzig Pilze.
description.italian: Raccogli cinquantacinque funghi.
description.russian: Соберите 55 грибов.
description.schinese: 收集五十五个蘑菇。
description.spanish: Consigue cincuenta y cinco setas.

description.english: Set fire to all inflammable items in Dwindling Heights.
description.french: Faites brûler tous les objets inflammables de Fort Deruine.
description.german: Verbrenne alle brennbaren Gegenstände in Burg Dieruin.
description.italian: Appicca il fuoco a tutti gli oggetti infiammabili a Forte Derovin.
description.russian: Подожгите все горючие объекты в Тающих башнях.
description.schinese: 在颓然高地点燃所有易燃物品。
description.spanish: Prende fuego a todos los objetos inflamables de Altos Derruina.

description.english: Complete the game without getting hit by an enemy.
description.french: Terminez le jeu sans être touché par un ennemi.
description.german: Beende das Spiel, ohne von einer Wache getroffen zu werden.
description.italian: Completa il gioco senza subire alcun colpo dal nemico.
description.russian: Завершите игру, не получив не одного удара от противников.
description.schinese: 完成游戏而不被敌人击中。
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin que te golpee ningún enemigo.

description.english: Complete the game without ever eating to regain energy.
description.french: Terminez le jeu sans manger quoi que ce soit pour regagner vos forces.
description.german: Beende das Spiel, ohne dich mit Nahrung zu regenerieren.
description.italian: Completa il gioco senza mai mangiare per recuperare l’energia.
description.russian: Завершите игру, не употребив никакой пищи для восстановления энергии.
description.schinese: 不吃东西就能恢复体力。
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin comer para recuperar energía.

description.english: Learn all skills in the adventure.
description.french: Apprenez toutes les compétences durant l'aventure.
description.german: Erlerne alle Fähigkeiten während deines Abenteuers.
description.italian: Apprendi tutte le abilità nell’avventura.
description.russian: Овладейте всеми доступными навыками за время своих приключений.
description.schinese: 学习冒险中的所有技能。
description.spanish: Aprende todas las habilidades de la aventura.

description.english: Complete the game without alerting any guards.
description.french: Terminez le jeu sans alerter un seul garde.
description.german: Beende das Spiel, ohne eine Wache zu alarmieren.
description.italian: Completa il gioco senza allertare alcuna guardia.
description.russian: Завершите игру, не потревожив ни одного стражника.
description.schinese: 完成游戏而不惊动任何警卫。
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin alertar a ningún guardia.

description.english: Unlock forty-five footnotes.
description.french: Débloquez quarante-cinq entrées sur le monde du jeu.
description.german: Schalte fünfundfünfzig Fußnoten frei.
description.italian: Sblocca quarantacinque note.
description.russian: Добавьте в справочник 44 примечания.
description.schinese: 解开45个脚注。
description.spanish: Desbloquea cuarenta y cinco notas al pie.

description.english: Discover the name of every possible character in Dwindling Heights.
description.french: Faites connaissance avec tous les personnages peuplant Fort Deruine.
description.german: Finde die Namen aller Charaktere in Burg Dieruin heraus.
description.italian: Scopri il nome di ogni personaggio possibile a Forte Derovin.
description.russian: Узнайте имена всех персонажей в Тающих башнях.
description.schinese: 在颓然高地中发现每个可能的角色的名字。
description.spanish: Descubre el nombre de todos los personajes posibles de Altos Derruina.

description.english: Steal all of the Rat Guards' handkerchiefs.
description.french: Volez tous les mouchoirs de la Garde des Rats.
description.german: Stiehl alle Taschentücher der Rattenwache.
description.italian: Ruba tutti i fazzoletti della guardia dei Ratti.
description.russian: Украдите носовые платки у всех членов Крысиной гвардии.
description.schinese: 偷所有鼠警的手帕。
description.spanish: Roba todos los pañuelos de los guardias.

description.english: Open all window shutters.
description.french: Ouvrez tous les volets.
description.german: Öffne alle Fensterläden.
description.italian: Apri tutte le serrande delle finestre.
description.russian: Откройте все оконные ставни.
description.schinese: 打开所有百叶窗。
description.spanish: Abre todas las contraventanas.

description.english: Play all songs during the course of the game.
description.french: Jouez toutes les chansons au cours du jeu.
description.german: Spiele alle Lieder im Verlauf des Spiels.
description.italian: Riproduci tutte le canzoni durante il gioco.
description.russian: Исполните все песни за время игры.
description.schinese: 在游戏过程中播放所有歌曲。
description.spanish: Canta todas las canciones durante el juego.

description.english: Reach the highest point in the highest tower.
description.french: Atteignez le point le plus élevé de la plus haute tour.
description.german: Erreiche den höchsten Punkt auf dem höchsten Turm.
description.italian: Raggiungi il punto più alto nella torre più alta.
description.russian: Заберитесь на самую высокую точку самой высокой башни.
description.schinese: 在最高的塔中到达最高点。
description.spanish: Alcanza el punto más alto de la torre más alta.
